message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, you can have the rest
I'll take a bigger share, you can have a smaller one
I'll give you a decent share, but I want the majority
I'll take a big chunk, you can have a small one, but it's better than nothing
I'll take most of it, you can have a tiny share, but I'm getting desperate
I'll take most of it, you can have a small consolation prize, but I'm not giving up
I'll give up, you can have it all
